definitions.body: :1Ch 28:11 chamber, room (NH id.; Ph. [[חדר]], [[חדרת]]; Sab. [[חַדר]] Mordt:ZMG, 1876, 24; Eth. m4xdar:)—abs. [[חֶדֶר]] 2Sa 13:10 + 11 t.; [[הַחַ֫דְרָה]] Ge 43:20, 1Ki 1:15; [[הֶחָָדְרָה]] Ju Jdg 15:1, 2Sa 13:10; cstr. [[חֶ֫דֶר]] Ct So 3:4; [[חֲדֶר]] Ex 7:28 + 5 t.; sf. [[חֶדְרוֹ]] Joe 2:16; pl. [[חֲדָרִים]] De 32:25, Pr 24:4; cstr. [[חַדְרֵי]] Pr 7:27 + 8 t.; sf. [[חֲדָרֶיךָ]] Is 26:20; [[חֲדָרָיו]] Ct So 1:4, 1Ch 28:11; —room, chamber, usually private, as bedroom Ge 43:30 (J), Ju Jdg 15:1, Jdg 16:9, Jdg 16:12, 2Sa 13:10, 2Sa 13:10, 1Ki 1:15, Ct So 1:4, Is 26:20; Ju Jdg 14:18 rd. prob. [[הַחַדְרָה]] bridal-chamber for [[הַחַרְסָה]] Sta:ZAW 1884, 253, cf. Joe 2:16 (‖[[חֻפָּתָהּ]] of bride), [[הוֹרָתִי]] ´[[ח]] Ct So 3:4 (‖[[בֵּית אִמִּי]]); of kings (of Egypt) Ps 105:30; specif.: [[מִשְׁכָּב]] ´[[ח]] bed-chamber Ex 7:28 (J), 2Sa 4:7, 2Ki 6:12, Ec 10:20; other combinations:—[[הַמְּקֵרָה]] ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 3:24 = cool chamber; [[הַפְּנִימִים]] ´[[ח]] 1Ch 28:11 inner chamber; [[חדרי מַשְׂכִּיתוֹ]] Ez Eze 8:12 his chambers of imagery (del. Hi Co Sgfr.); ´[[בְּח]] ´[[ח]] a chamber within a chamber, i.e. an innermost chamber 1Ki 20:30, 1Ki 22:25 = 2Ch 18:24, 2Ki 9:2; pl. = store-rooms Pr 24:4; so [[הַמִּטּוֹת]] ´[[ח]] 2Ki 11:2 = 2Ch 22:11, i.e. room where beds were stored (Ke Th); metaph. ´[[ח]] [[מָָוֶת]] Pr 7:27 (‖[[דַּרְכֵי שְׁאוֹל]]); [[חדרי תֵּמָן]] Job 9:9 chambers of south (where constellations are treasured up, v. Di; Hoffm. thinks of n.pr. of star or constell.); cf. Job 37:9 a chamber whence comes storm-wind ([[סוּפָה]]); [[חַדְרֵי בֶטֶן]] i.e. inner parts of body, only fig. Pr 18:8 = Pr 26:22, Pr 20:27, Pr 20:30; in De 32:25 [[מֵחֲדָרִים]] = within, poet. for [[מִבַּיִת]], ‖[[מִחוּץ]] without.
